title: Iaai (1901) Genesis Portion
description:
Iai, formerly called Namua: Maipua, or Eurika, is spoken by about 7,000 people in the Purari River Delta of the Gulf District, Territory of Papua and New Guinea. It is a non-Austronesian language.

1910 Matthew John 1920 New Testament London, Translated by J.. H. Holmes, London MS. 1967 Mark BFBS, Australia Translated by Lynn Calvert, LMS.
